channel.title: Onboarding on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Onboarding on Blog

item.title: How I created a pull request on my first day at work
item.description: I’m not talking about myself regarding the pull request (okay, I’ll talk about it a bit at the end of this blog post), there is nothing special about it. I want to talk about how a smooth and comprehensive onboarding process could let me create a pull request on the first day at work. All of these onboarding processes were done in less than 4 hours. Kudos for the people who helped me!
